name: Daunting Shadows (Updated)
description:
!!!!!  This is a second upload to my Game Jam post for the Lux Jam entry as I fixed some bugs. I will be deleting this post after finalists have been chosen and I will update my original. !!!!!

In the depths of light lurks shadows. In this game you will shoot shadow slugs to try and save your light! Get hit three times and you're out! Good luck getting new high scores!

Updated:

- NEW LIGHT BAR!

-Added new info to How to Play

Upcoming Updates:

- (Maybe) A level system

-Options Menu being functional

-Music and Sound FX

-New Enemies

-Regen Spawns

Hello, my name is Michael and I am a brand new game developer! This is a second upload to my Game Jam post for the Lux Jam entry. I will be deleting this post after finalists have been chosen and I will update my original. I hope to learn more by participating in more Jams and eventually hope to make a successful Indie Game.

Feel free to leave me feedback in a comment or on Instagram.

Instagram: @GarnetDevLogs
